resources.string: This app provides a tile in the quick settings (the place that holds the toggles for e.g. Wi-Fi and Bluetooth) that allows you to keep the display awake without having to change the device settings.
Coffee can be stopped by clicking on the tile or the notification or when the screen is turned off manually.
If Coffee doesn\'t work on your device, it\'s most likely caused by a battery saver on your device. You can click the button below to find out how to disable it.
You can also try to disable battery optimization.
